long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
memegen allows you to search through popular templates, create a meme, share and download without leaving the current tab!

Additional Information :

- It uses the imgflip API so there will be a watermark
- Sometimes generate requests might be throttled due to large traffic

The extension is free and open source

code - https://github.com/bhupeshpr25/memegen

stars appreciated :)
